DOC.brief_summary: The experimental pain model study proposal show characteristic inflame wound pro-inflammatory response . This study help discover candidate genetic and/or proteomic pain biomarkers could provide objective mechanism base test diagnose , monitor quantify pain . We also hope determine measurable effect know non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAID ) biomarkers pain inflammation .
DOC.criteria: 1 ) Age 1860 2 ) Skin type II III accord classification Fitzpatrick 3 ) Negative pregnancy test ( woman childbearing potential ) 4 ) Willing able sign inform consent form Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act ( HIPAA ) authorization comply study procedures 1 ) History acute chronic illness may hinder study procedure confuse interpretation data ( e.g . dermatological , neurological , psychiatric addictive disease ) 2 ) Clinically significant cardiovascular , pulmonary , hepatic renal disease 3 ) Major bodily injury within 3 month study participation 4 ) Surgery within 3 month study participation 5 ) Pregnancy breastfeed 6 ) Intake prescription drug anti/proinflammatory action 7 ) Intake prescription drug anti/proanalgesic action 8 ) Inability abstain anti/pro inflammatory drug 24hour period precede study session 9 ) Inability abstain anti/proanalgesic drug 24hour period precede study session 10 ) Prior medical history would contraindicate use NSAID , previous negative reaction NSAIDs aspirin 11 ) Inability obtain least 6 hour sleep night precede study session
